-- Drop database if it exists
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS Demo
GO


-- Create new database
CREATE DATABASE [Demo];
GO


USE [Demo];
GO

----
-- Create views for dimension and fact tables
----

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dimActorsVw;
GO

CREATE VIEW dimActorsVw AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.blob.core.windows.net/gold/DimActors.parquet/*.parquet',
      FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [FTD];
GO


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dimMoviesVw;
GO

CREATE VIEW dimMoviesVw AS
SELECT
    MovieID
    , MovieTitle
    , CAST( ReleaseDate AS Date ) AS ReleaseDate
    , Genre
    , Rating
    , CAST( AvailabilityYear AS VARCHAR ) AS AvailabilityYear
    , CAST( Runtime AS INT ) AS Runtime
    , CAST( AvailabilityDate AS VARCHAR ) AS AvailabilityDate
    , CAST( MovieTier AS INT ) AS MovieTier
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.blob.core.windows.net/gold/DimMovies.parquet/*.parquet',
      FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [FTD];
GO



DROP VIEW IF EXISTS factMovieActorsVw;
GO

CREATE VIEW factMovieActorsVw AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.blob.core.windows.net/gold/FactMovieActors.parquet/*.parquet',
      FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [FTD];
GO


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dimCustomersVw;
GO

CREATE VIEW dimCustomersVw AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.blob.core.windows.net/gold/DimCustomers.parquet/*.parquet',
      FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [FTD];
GO


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dimTransactionsVw;
GO

CREATE VIEW dimTransactionsVw AS
SELECT
    TransactionID
    , CustomerID
    , CAST( TransactionDate AS Date ) AS TransactionDate
    , CAST( ShipDate AS Date ) AS ShipDate
    , CAST( ProcessDate AS Date ) AS ProcessDate
    , ROUND( CAST( TotalCost AS FLOAT ), 2 )  AS TotalCost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.blob.core.windows.net/gold/DimTransactions.parquet/*.parquet',
      FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [FTD];
GO


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dimTransactionDetailsVw;
GO

CREATE VIEW dimTransactionDetailsVw AS
SELECT
    TransactionDetailID
    , MovieID
    , CAST( Quantity AS INT ) AS Quantity
    , ROUND( CAST( UnitCost AS FLOAT ), 2 ) AS UnitCost
    , CAST( LineNumber AS INT ) AS LineNumber
    , CAST( ProcessDate AS Date ) AS ProcessDate
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.blob.core.windows.net/gold/DimTransactionDetails.parquet/*.parquet',
      FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [FTD];
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS factTransactionDetailsVw;
GO

CREATE VIEW factTransactionDetailsVw AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.blob.core.windows.net/gold/FactTransactionDetails.parquet/*.parquet',
      FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [FTD];
GO
